page.title: 15RELIGION IN SOUTHREPPS
page.content: Average number of communicants on Sunday is 5.4% increasing to 18% at major festivals. 76% of church attenders are over 60 years of age. However there is much Christian activity in Sunday Schools, youth clubs and the local school. Parishes are now grouped together in the Trunch Group sharing resources and fellowship. Eachparish still has a Sunday service. The Group is served by three team vicars, readers (trained laity) and retired clergy. Combined services occasionally held by Anglicans and Methodists. Alternative Service Book used in most Anglican services resulting in greater congreg- ation participation. Less formal ser- vices including liturgical dancing & drama held occasionally. Followers of other persuations have to leave the village for services.
